digitalTransformation.title: Adoption of Smart Technology
digitalTransformation.description: Encouraging the use of advanced technologies in facility management to improve operational efficiency, increase productivity, and reduce costs. By adopting smart and digital solutions, higher levels of performance and sustainability can be achieved in daily operations

coOperation.title: Developing Local Competencies
coOperation.description: Training and qualifying national staff on the latest technologies and practices in smart facility management to ensure their readiness to face future challenges and achieve the highest levels of efficiency and innovation.

creativity.title: Promoting Sustainability
creativity.description: Implementing smart solutions to achieve environmental and economic sustainability in facility management, contributing to improved performance, reduced environmental impact, and achieving sustainable financial savings.

footer.description: Sary Exhibitions & Conferences is a leading company offering high-quality event management, exhibitions, and marketing services, through a specialized team that is always ready to provide everything new and innovative. Extensive experience with both government and private sectors, along with comprehensive support for subsidiary services. Your preferred partner, always.

sponserMinister.eventDate: The International Conference and Exhibition on Facility Management kicks off in September 2025

videoSection.visionDescription: To become a central platform in the development and application of "Facility Intelligence" technologies, empowering businesses and individuals to adopt the latest smart solutions for effective and sustainable Facility Management . We aim to provide innovative solutions that align with the goals of Saudi Arabia's Vision 2030 to build a smart and sustainable future that enhances quality of life.
videoSection.messageDescription: Through the International Facility Management Conference and Exhibition 2025, we aim to empower industry leaders, innovators, and decision-makers to exchange knowledge and experiences in advanced "Facility Intelligence" technologies. This will be achieved through meetings and collaborations that bring together experts and innovators in this field.
videoSection.participantsDescription: The event attracts a select group of experts, specialists, and the largest facilities in the field of facility management from around the world.

whatIsEvent.eventTitle: About the International Facility Management Conference and Exhibition 2025
whatIsEvent.eventDescription: The 2025 International Facility Management Conference and Exhibition, in its second edition, comes under the theme "Facility Intelligence." It will serve as a leading platform that brings together local and international experts, decision-makers, and innovators in the field of Facility Management . The conference aims to showcase the latest developments and technologies in smart Facility Management , as well as to exchange experiences and best practices to achieve a sustainable and intelligent future. The conference aligns with the goals of Saudi Arabia's Vision 2030, which seeks to transform the kingdom into a global model in various aspects of life, from sustainable economy to modern technology. By promoting innovation in Facility Management , the conference contributes to achieving this ambitious vision through the development of smart infrastructure and enhancing resource management efficiency.

whyThisEvent.description1: - The largest and most specialized exhibition in the field of facility management.
whyThisEvent.description2: - Significant interest from various government entities, agencies, and private sector establishments.
whyThisEvent.description3: - The ideal venue to showcase the latest technologies and equipment.
whyThisEvent.description4: - The largest event of its kind in the Gulf region and the Arab world.

registrationForm.phoneFormat: Phone number must start with the country code followed by at least 9 digits.
registrationForm.phoneTooShort: Phone number must have at least 9 digits after the country code.
registrationForm.privacy_policy_content: Welcome to the International Facilities Management Conference and Exhibition. Please note that upon completing the registration process for the event, the conference management may share your basic contact information registered on the site with other attendees, exhibitors, and sponsors of the event to facilitate communication. By participating in this event, you agree that you may be photographed or appear during the live broadcast and grant the conference management or the organizing company the right to use and publish your image and/or likeness and/or name in videos and/or photos taken during this event for use by the conference management worldwide, forever, and in all media.

about.title: About Us
about.description: The 2025 International Facility Management Conference and Exhibition, in its second edition, comes under the theme "Facility Intelligence." It will serve as a leading platform that brings together local and international experts, decision-makers, and innovators in the field of Facility Management . The conference aims to showcase the latest developments and technologies in smart Facility Management , as well as to exchange experiences and best practices to achieve a sustainable and intelligent future. The conference aligns with the goals of Saudi Arabia's Vision 2030, which seeks to transform the kingdom into a global model in various aspects of life, from sustainable economy to modern technology. By promoting innovation in Facility Management , the conference contributes to achieving this ambitious vision through the development of smart infrastructure and enhancing resource management efficiency.
about.card1Description: Learn with us about the opportunities for innovation in operations and procedures to achieve excellence in facilities management.
about.card2Description: Learn with us about the various experiences and practices in the field of facilities management.
about.card3Description: By attending and participating with us, you will be able to benefit from local and international expertise in the field of facilities management.
about.dontMissOut: Don’t miss the chance to be part of the event
about.boostYourBrand: Enhance your presence and reinforce your brand

activities.title: Activities
activities.activities_description: A new addition to this year's conference is the business exchange platform, which allows companies to interact with their target audience to inform them about their activities and updates.
activities.participation_description: Take advantage of this opportunity for a unique experience, including tours of modern facilities and other benefits.
activities.participation_opportunity: Take advantage of this opportunity for a unique experience.

conditions.title: Guidelines and Conditions
conditions.conference_overview: Overview of the International Conference and Exhibition for Facility Management (Organized by the Saudi Facility Management Association - SFMA)
conditions.conference_description: The International Conference and Exhibition for Facility Management 2025 returns for its second edition under the theme 'Facility Intelligence.' This premier platform brings together local and international experts, decision-makers, and innovators in the field of facility management. The conference aims to showcase the latest advancements and technologies in smart facility management, exchange knowledge, and share best practices to achieve a sustainable and intelligent future. Aligned with Saudi Arabia's Vision 2030, the conference supports the nation's transformation into a global model of excellence, from sustainable economies to cutting-edge technology. By promoting innovation in facility management, the conference contributes to realizing this ambitious vision through developing smart infrastructure and achieving greater resource efficiency.
conditions.conference_location: - Location: Riyadh International Convention and Exhibition Center
conditions.topic_1: 1. Smart Facility Technologies: Exploring the latest innovations in facility management.
conditions.topic_2: 2. Sustainable Facility Management: Emphasizing sustainable practices in project planning and execution.
conditions.topic_3: 3. Innovation and Digital Transformation: Leveraging digital transformation and IT in facilities.
conditions.invitation_text: The Saudi Facility Management Association (SFMA) invites you to share your knowledge and expertise as a presenter at the International Conference and Exhibition for Facility Management 2025. This is the perfect opportunity to showcase your expertise and research on an international level.
conditions.acceptance_criteria: We would like to emphasize the importance of adhering to the specified deadlines for submitting papers and presentations. Late submissions may affect the final evaluation and participation, so please ensure compliance with the deadlines to ensure a smooth workflow.
conditions.requirements: Please refer to the attached files for the terms and requirements for presentation submission.
conditions.card_2: The deadline for announcing the acceptance of work papers
conditions.card_3: Deadline for submission of papers and presentations

conference.title: Conference
conference.event_name: International Conference and Exhibition for Facility Management 2025
conference.description_text: The International Conference and Exhibition for Facility Management 2025 returns for its second edition under the slogan "Facility Intelligence." It serves as a leading platform that brings together local and international experts, decision-makers, and innovators in the field of facility management. The conference aims to showcase the latest developments and technologies in smart facility management and to exchange experiences and best practices to achieve a sustainable and intelligent future. The conference aligns with the goals of Saudi Arabia's Vision 2030, which seeks to transform the Kingdom into a global model in various aspects of life, from sustainable economy to modern technology. By promoting innovation in facility management, the conference contributes to achieving this ambitious vision through the development of smart infrastructure and enhancing resource management efficiency.
conference.venue: Riyadh International Convention and Exhibition Center
conference.participation_reason_text: The International Conference and Exhibition for Facility Management 2025 offers a rich platform with sessions showcasing the latest innovations and advanced technologies in this field. A select group of experts and speakers will provide unique and inspiring insights aimed at enhancing facility efficiency and sustainable performance, while presenting future solutions to tackle challenges in innovative ways.
conference.commitment_sub_title: Smart Technology, Strong Partnerships, Sustainable Future for Our Facilities
conference.commitment_text_1: Implementing smart solutions to achieve environmental and economic sustainability in facility management.
conference.commitment_text_2: Building international and local partnerships to exchange knowledge and expertise in facility management.
conference.commitment_text_3: Encouraging the use of advanced technologies in facility management to improve operational efficiency.
conference.commitment_text_4: Supporting innovative ideas and startups that offer new solutions in the field of Facility Intelligence.
conference.commitment_text_5: Training and qualifying national staff on the latest technologies and practices in smart facility management.
conference.vision_title: Towards Smart and Sustainable Facilities that Meet Future Aspirations
conference.vision_text: To become a central platform in the development and application of "smart facility" technologies, enabling companies and individuals to adopt the latest smart solutions for effective and sustainable facility management. We aim to provide innovative solutions that align with the goals of Saudi Arabia's Vision 2030, building a smart and sustainable future that enhances quality of life.
conference.mission_title: Innovative Technologies for Efficient and Sustainable Facilities that Meet Aspirations
conference.mission_text_1: Through the International Conference and Exhibition for Facility Management 2025, we aim to empower industry leaders, innovators, and decision-makers to exchange knowledge and expertise in advanced "smart facility" technologies through meetings and collaborations that bring together experts and innovators in this field.
conference.join_us: for an unparalleled opportunity to engage, learn and contribute to the advancement of world-class facilities management. Together, let us innovate the future and achieve excellence in our various fields.

register.title: Register Now
register.address: Riyadh International Convention and Exhibition Center

sponsor.introductionText: Join us to showcase your brand and engage with our audience.
sponsor.benefitsIntro: Discover the benefits of sponsoring our event.

sponsor_1.boost_presence: Boost Your Presence and Strengthen Your Brand
sponsor_1.promotion_text: We inform you that once you contact us, you can book one of the exhibition stands at the conference. This is an important opportunity to promote your brand and the services you provide, learn about your competitors in the Saudi market (the largest market in the Middle East), conduct business, and conclude numerous deals. One of the organizing team members will contact you to complete the booking procedures, provide advice, and answer all your questions, helping us serve you better.
sponsor_1.card1_title: The Largest Event of Its Kind
sponsor_1.card1_text: It is the specialized exhibition and conference in the field of facility management in the region. The conference aims to provide an unparalleled platform to explore the latest products, innovations, and technological advancements in facility management globally. It will bring together leaders in the field to offer insights on building flexible business models with agile automated digital processes.
sponsor_1.card2_title: Showcasing the Latest Technologies and Devices
sponsor_1.card2_text: The conference aims to showcase the latest technologies and devices in facility management. Technology plays a significant role in improving operational efficiency and achieving maintenance and operational goals in facility management. Modern technologies can help avoid issues such as equipment failure, maintenance neglect, and inefficient resource use. Technology employs its ability to measure, analyze, and detect patterns in large data sets to achieve efficiency and continuous improvement.
sponsor_1.card3_text: This event provides an ideal platform for building strong and profitable investment relationships. The conference brings together various companies and investors in the facility management sector, offering opportunities for networking and collaboration. To build successful investment relationships, we must be aware of the importance of communication and trust. Investing in joint projects or sharing knowledge and expertise between companies and investors can be the foundation of strong relationships. Additionally, we must be prepared to learn and adapt to changes in the facility management market. By adopting sustainable strategies and leveraging emerging opportunities, we can build investment relationships that enhance the success of our projects and promote sector growth.
sponsor_1.why_sponsor_text: Choosing one of the conference and exhibition sponsorship categories will grant you many benefits according to each category. You can learn more about the advantages by contacting us and reviewing the detailed sponsorship benefits.
sponsor_1.location_text: The exhibition will be held in Riyadh, specifically at the Riyadh International Convention and Exhibition Center, which is a central and convenient location that makes it easily accessible from various areas.
sponsor_1.target_audience_text: The exhibition targets a local and international audience, which means that it seeks to attract visitors and exhibitors from within and outside the country.
sponsor_1.participants_text: The exhibition includes a number of participants from the public and private sectors, and is a platform to meet experts, academics, decision-makers and those interested in the field of facilities management.
sponsor_1.dont_miss_event: Don't Miss the Opportunity to Be Part of the Event
sponsor_1.boost_presence_slogan: Boost Your Presence and Strengthen Your Brand
